#!/bin/bash echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to devint by Jenkins
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: dai_cm
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "DAI_CM_HOME = ${DAI_CM_HOME}" ls -alR $DAI_CM_HOME echo "Replacing contents from DAI_CM_HOME with ./config config files" rm -fr /opt/cvbuild/config/dai_cm/*.properties cd ${WORKSPACE}/config for base in *devint.properties*; do new=`echo $base | sed 's/devint.//g'`; echo "Renaming $base to $new and copying to ${DAI_CM_HOME}"; cp $base $DAI_CM_HOME/$new; ls -al $DAI_CM_HOME/$new; done ls -alR $DAI_CM_HOME echo "Showing config file content" cd ${DAI_CM_HOME} cat *.properties echo "Setting to Grails 2.3.7" ./opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/groovy/bin/setgrail237.sh echo "DB Rebuild: yes
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log

#!/bin/ksh
VERSION="4.0.1_${BUILD_NUMBER}"
echo "Returning to Grails 2.0.4" ./opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/groovy/bin/setgrail204.sh
print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/build/scripts
./deployapp.sh -a Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-cm -t Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-cm -e devint -r ${VERSION} -i cm -v
